heroDescription: Our mentorship program operates with limited openings to ensure every partner receives undivided attention and continuous strategic support. This exclusive approach prioritizes deep, personalized strategies over generic solutions. Get in touch to reserve your exclusive slot.
contactInfoDescription: Complete the form and our team will respond shortly to help you take the next step.
autoFilledNote: These values are automatically populated from your profile. If any of them are incorrect, please update them in the Profile page.
name: Name
challengesLabel: What challenges are you currently facing?
challengeOptions: Difference in Values & Approaches Among Family Members
aboutLabel: Tell us about your business and goals
aboutPlaceholder: Describe your business, industry, current stage, and what you’re working towards...
expectationsLabel: What are you hoping to achieve through mentorship?
expectationsPlaceholder: Share your specific objectives and desired outcomes from this mentorship program...
challengesRequired: Please select at least one challenge.
emailError: We’re experiencing a temporary issue with our mail service. Please try again shortly or contact us directly at contact@mail.shift-er.com
messageSentTitle: Your message has been sent successfully!
messageSentDescription: Thank you for reaching out to us. Our team will review your message and get back to you as soon as possible. Keep an eye on your inbox for our reply.
